featured.text: Mary lost ten kilograms in three months, so her _____ skin-tight jeans are now hanging off her hips.
A properly made kilt should not be so loose that the wearer can easily twist the kilt around the body, nor should it be so tight that it causes bulging of the fabric where it is buckled.
To stick to a tight budget, Robert bought a more ______ LED TV instead of a fancy, expensive 3D TV.

definition.zh_def: 緊的，牢固的，無法鬆開或放鬆的。
definition.en_def: Firmly held in place; not loose.
definition.example: The lid was too tight to open without a tool.
